subtitle: Breadcrumbs fried in hazelnut oil add a nutty flavour and crunch to this festive vegetable.

method.text: Cook the brussels sprouts in boiling water for 5-10 min until just tender. Drain well.
Heat the oil in a frying pan. Gently fry the breadcrumbs until they have absorbed all the oil and are crispy and golden.
Pile the brussels sprouts into a warm serving dish. Sprinkle over the breadcrumbs.

title: Crispy topped brussels sprouts
